code: import React from'react';import{toastType}from'../../constants/index';import{faCheck,faClose,faXmark}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{placeholderText}from"../sharedMethod";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ToastCard=props=>{const{type,text,closeToast}=props;const iconColor=type===toastType.ERROR?'toast-card__icon--error':'toast-card__icon--success';const renderCard=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`${iconColor}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:type===toastType.ERROR?faXmark:faCheck,className:"fs-1"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mx-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"toast-card__toast-title",children:`${type===toastType.ERROR?placeholderText("toast.error.title"):placeholderText("toast.successful.title")}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"toast-card__toast-message",children:text})]})]});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"toast-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faClose,className:"fs-3 toast-card__close-btn",onClick:closeToast}),renderCard()]});};export default ToastCard;
